data.event: Belen was founded in 1740 as Nuestra Senora de Belen by a group of Spanish colonists led by Diego Torres and Antonio Salazar, who received permission to settle the tract of land known as the Belen Grant the year before.

event.title: known as the Belen Grant the year before

data.event: Belen was founded in 1740 as Nuestra Senora de Belen by a group of Spanish colonists led by Diego Torres and Antonio Salazar, who received permission to settle the tract of land known as the Belen Grant the year before.

event.title: 1793, a Catholic church and parish was founded

data.event: By 1793, a Catholic church and parish was founded.
